Reviews.Title: “Location was great, CLEAN and friendly service.”
Reviews.Author: Tawanda1206
Reviews.Content: husband stayed 5 days february ten anniversary 5th avenue main drag playa del carmen block makes price reasonable close walk walked walmart taxi bc stuff helpful staff advice night dinner plans didnt mention fabulous little italian owned couple rome busy hot tubs roof meant clean normal temp little cooler day im bed little stiff husband loved pool decoration purposes chose kitchenette included nice size fridge wifi access fast free able skype kids issues stay

Reviews.Title: “Great location and super comfortable”
Reviews.Author: joferto
Reviews.Content: hotels ago location superb 5th avenue walk enjoy restaurant shop close beach spacious nice decoration linens nice bed comfortable blender stay night staying family friends minibar stocked microwave china glasses pool spend time hotel beach ocean close roof 3 jacuzzis attractive planning bar near future bad aware location 5th ave 40th opposite ferry perfect definetely

Reviews.Title: “Modern hotel, great location”
Reviews.Author: SaraAlice
Reviews.Content: bambu suites location close beach main street 5th avenue hotel lovely comfotable beds huge kitchendining amazing value pool nice spas roof definately reccommend

Reviews.Title: “Awsome designer hotel with great value”
Reviews.Author: arnfinnu
Reviews.Content: girlfriend junior suite surprised nice kitchen shower flat screen wifi design appeals families staff friendly arrived late jacuzzi roof front care location close beach main street recommend
